items.description: Understanding why robots need a nervous system and the fundamental concepts of ROS 2

items.description: Summary of ROS 2 concepts and implementation for humanoid robotics

items.description: Summary of AI integration and NVIDIA Isaac concepts for humanoid robotics

items.description: Introduction to multimodal AI systems for integrated perception and action in humanoid robotics

items.description: Implementing advanced AI capabilities for humanoid robots using NVIDIA Isaac platform

items.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics: Bridging Digital and Physical Intelligence
items.description: A comprehensive technical book on building AI systems for humanoid robots, covering ROS 2, simulation, NVIDIA Isaac, and Vision-Language-Action systems.

items.title: Vision-Language-Action Systems
items.description: Creating integrated perception-action systems that understand and respond to human commands
